effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises all of the user’s stats by two stages.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises all of the user’s stats by two stages.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises all of the user’s stats by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.
